name: Actually Terrible TD
description:
This is my submission for Dani's Basement Jam #2, which was a 5-day jam with the theme: "Once Upon A TERRIBLE TIME".

It is ACTUALLY terrible. 

YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!

You can hardly even call this a game but I think I learned the most out of this game jam (out of 3) so far. I got to mess around with the AI navigation system and raycasting to the cursor, both of which were topics I decided to want to learn more about in this game jam. I think I would like to have another go at making a tower defense game soon...
